charges.charge_description: 18:1959(a)(1), 2 and 3551 et seq.-Murder in aid of racketeering. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 120 months of imprisonment. Supervised release: Five years to run concurrently. Special assessment: $450.00. (1)
